mapper.insert: insert into sedesign.team(ProjectID, ProjectName, TeamleaderID, TeamleaderName, Teammate1ID, Teammate1Name, Teammate2ID, Teammate2Name, State, TeacherID) values (#{ProjectID}, #{ProjectName}, #{TeamleaderID},#{TeamleaderName}, #{Teammate1ID}, #{Teammate1Name}, #{Teammate2ID}, #{Teammate2Name}, #{State}, #{TeacherID})
mapper.select: select * from sedesign.team where Teammate1ID = #{id} or Teammate1ID = #{id} or Teammate2ID = #{id}
select * from sedesign.team where TeamleaderName like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%') or Teammate1Name like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%') or Teammate2Name like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
select * from sedesign.team where ProjectName like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
select * from sedesign.team where TeacherID = #{id} and State = 'nopass'
select * from sedesign.team where TeacherID = #{id} and State = 'pass'
select * from sedesign.team order by TeamID limit #{param1},#{param2}
